attributes.action: Stop ticket touting and the websites that sell them.
attributes.additional_details: look at the websites and the prices they are paying. Most events sell out in the first half hour or so and within minutes these touting websites are selling them at ridiculous prices. Leaving many fans disappointed.
attributes.background: Many true fans are unable to get tickets to gigs/events due to people buying up the tickets to sell at treble the face value. If the websites (Viagogo, seat wave and get me in etc) are banned from selling above the face value then this will not happen.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106996

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
